description:
Step into the Octagon with the official UFC app—home to UFC FIGHT PASS, the exclusive streaming service of the UFC and your gateway to premier combat sports.

Experience the thrill of live UFC events, access an unrivaled fight library, and enjoy exclusive programming that brings you closer to the action.

UFC FIGHT PASS: The Ultimate Combat Sports Destination
	•	Live Events: Stream weekly UFC action and 200+ global combat sports events.
	•	Fight Library: Relive legendary bouts, full fight cards, and behind-the-scenes content.
	•	Historic Archive: Explore classics from PRIDE, Strikeforce, WEC, and 50+ organizations.
	•	Original Programming: Go deeper with hit series and original programming like Fightlore and Year of the Fighter.
	•	Multi-Device Access: Watch on smartphone, tablet, computer, or smart TV.

Subscription Menu
	•	UFC FIGHT PASS is available as a monthly or annual subscription plan.
	•	Payment will be charged to your iTunes/Apple Account at confirmation of purchase.
	•	All subscriptions auto-renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
	•	Subscriptions can be managed by the user, including disabling auto-renewal, in Account Settings.

UFC Pay-Per-View
	•	Watch the biggest UFC fights live with Pay-Per-View, available as a separate in-app purchase (availability varies by region).

Content & Availability
	•	Content and features vary by region, blackout restrictions, and holdback windows.
	•	Learn more: ufc.com/faq-ufctv-ufcfightpass
	•	Terms of Use: ufc.com/terms
	•	Privacy Policy: ufc.com/privacy-policy

Download the official UFC app today and unlock the ultimate combat sports experience—live fights, historic battles, and exclusive content, all in one place.

Experience the PGA TOUR like never before on your iOS device with the official PGA TOUR App.  Follow all of the action from a single app, available for free from the PGA TOUR.

- Real-time leaderboard with quick access to player scorecards, profiles, and videos
- Live player scorecards now featuring shot trails, play by play, and live stats
- Tee times and group location information
- Follow all the action directly on your lock screen with PGA TOUR Live Activities
- Access to LIVE video and audio for PGA TOUR events
- VOD including tournament highlights, round recaps, player features, and more
- All your favorite golf Podcasts
- Course detail with hole layouts, descriptions, and live stats for each hole
- All the latest news from PGATOUR.com
- Push notifications for following your favorite Tour and players
- Champions Tour, Korn Ferry Tour, PGA TOUR Americas coverage
- Location awareness for improved experiences while onsite at select PGA TOUR events

Helpotusta urheiluseurojen harrastajien ja perheiden arkeen

Tuttu tilanne tuhansille urheilun harrastajille ja perheille on arjen suunnittelu treenien, pelien ja kisojen ehdoilla. myClubilla urheilullisen arjen hallinta on helppoa, kun koko perheen harrastusten tiedot löytyvät samasta paikasta. myClub-sovelluksella:

* ilmoittaudut tapahtumiin
* seuraat aktiivisuutta
* kommentoit tapahtumia ja seuraat keskustelua
* luet ja kommentoit tiedotteita
* tarkastelet ja maksat laskuja
* ostat seuratuotteita verkkokaupassa
* näytät jäsenkortin
* selaat seuran tai ryhmän yhteystietoja
* hallinnoit jäsentilin käyttäjiä
* tarkistat ja päivität jäsentietosi
* muokkaat tietosuoja-asetuksia.

Missä ne esikoisen futistreenit olivatkaan? Milloin kuopuksen uimakoulu alkaa? Ehdinkö omaan säbäpeliin? myClub-sovelluksella vältät kaaoksen. Kaikki perheen harrastustapahtumat tietoineen näkyvät samalla sivulla, vaikka lajeja harrastetaan eri seuroissa.

Tarvitseeko esikoinen kyydin treeneihin? Tapahtumiin liittyvä viestintä onnistuu vaivatta suoraan sovelluksessa. Kun joku vastaa viestiin, saat ilmoituksen puhelimeesi. myClub-ilmoituksia saat myös uusista tiedotteista ja laskuista. Pysyt siis varmasti ajantasalla, mitä seurassa, joukkueessa tai ryhmässä tapahtuu!

Oliko se kausimaksu hoidettu? Harrastustoiminnan laskut löydät ja kuittaat maksetuiksi kätevästi sovelluksessa. Jos seurasi hyödyntää myClub-verkkokauppaa, voit ostaa seuratuotteita sovelluksessa muutamalla napautuksella. Mikäli saat seurasi jäsenenä joitakin etuja, löydät jäsenkorttisi näppärästi sovelluksesta.

Ajoissa paikalla oikeassa paikassa. Kyydit sovittu ja laskut maksettu. Puhelin kiinni ja kentälle!

myClub-sovelluksen käyttö edellyttää, että sinulla on voimassa oleva jäsentili myClub-palvelua hyödyntävään seuraan.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

In Veo Live you can watch live sports streaming from teams and clubs around the world, as it happens.

This means that you can watch your kids, your friends, or your local heroes perform like never before.

When a club live-streams using a Veo camera, their followers receive a notification which will take them straight to the action in the Live App.

Even more, you can beam this up onto larger devices via Chromecast or Airplay to really amplify the live experience!

Come and discover new teams. Discover new athletes. Build your live sports community through the Veo Live app.

Enkora OnTheMove on yleiskattava “One Stop” -mobiilisovellus kaikille Enkoran asiakkaiden loppukäyttäjille. Samassa sovelluksessa asiakkaat voivat hallita omia tietojaan ja kaikkia jäsenyyksiä kaikissa urheilutiloissa, sekä muissa palveluissa, joissa käytetään Enkora -järjestelmiä.

developer: Suomen Olympiakomitea ry, Finlands Olympiska Kommitte rf
description:
Suomisport on liikunnan ja urheilun oma digipalvelu, jonka käyttäjiä ovat suomalaiset liikkujat, urheiluseurat ja lajiliitot.
Liikkuja luo Suomisportiin oman Sporttitilin, jonka avulla voi helposti hallita omaa, lastensa ja seurakäyttäjänä myös oman seuransa sporttiarkea.

Suomisport on urheilun oma verkkokauppa, mistä harrastusta etsivän on helppo löytää uusi harrastus ja urheilun koko palvelutarjoama.

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

Uudella PTV Gym-applikaatiolla hallitset kattavasti kuntosalikokemustasi! Voit avata sovelluksella salisi oven, lukea tiedotteita ja vastaanottaa ilmoituksia, ottaa yhteyttä asiakaspalveluun sekä hallita yhteystietojasi.
Follow your favorite hockey club. See games live or on-demand.

Darts Scorer App Score Counter 2025 is designed for darts lovers.
With this app you can easily count scores while playing X01 and Cricket darts games with your friends. App calculates all points, statistics and automatically determines the winner. In the application you can choose players, the number of Legs and Sets, the game mode and the number of scores 301, 501. It is also possible to save games and play them later. You don't need to buy a special Scoreboard or scorekeeper, everything is available in your phone. Download and track game results with this easy-to-use and free darts calculator.

Jopox sovellus on käyttäjille suunniteltu mobiilisovellus, jonka avulla pysyt mukana joukkueesi/ryhmäsi arjessa missä ikinä oletkin.

Hallitse IN/OUT ilmoittautumisia, tarkastele ja maksa laskuja, seuraa viestintää sekä uutisia ja monia muita seuratoiminnan arjessa tapahtuvia asioita.

Jopox applikaation käyttö edellyttää, että seuralla/joukkueella on käytössään Jopox palvelu.

Target DartCounter is the world’s biggest darts scorer app for keeping track of all your scores. Play x01 games, Cricket, Around the Clock and several other training games.
Play online against your friends or challenge the computer dartbot.
In the x01 games you will hear the voice of MasterCaller Ray Martin who will announce your name and all your scores.

Register or log in and all your games will be saved.
Play with multiple players with a DartCounter account and the whole game will be saved in both accounts.

IN-APP PURCHASES 
The app offers one in-app purchases; "Ultimate Yearly" and "Ultimate Monthly". These are annual  and monthly auto renewable subscription which gives you access to more features and statistics to improve your darts skills.

When you own this subscription you will get the newest gameplays earlier than the users without the subscription. Also, we will keep adding more Ultimate features in the future updates to make the usage easier, more detailed and even more fun!

GENERAL PAYMENT INFORMATION
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


PRICING
The Ultimate Yearly subscription costs $34.99 USD each year, the Ultimate Monthly subscription costs $4.99 USD each year. This will be automatically converted to your own currency by iTunes. For more information about the annual payment or how to cancel auto renewing, read "Payment & Cancellation".


PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

24 hours before the end of each subscription period (one year) you'll automatically be charged the same amount as you've paid for the initial purchase.
After renewing, your subscription will be valid for another year.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes/App Store account settings; 
you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period to avoid being billed for the next cycle. 
-------------------------------------------------
AGREEMENT
https://dartcounter.net/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
https://dartcounter.net/privacy-policy

Trackman Golf is the one-stop-shop for all your Trackman activities. Better golf starts here.
 
The app gives you comprehensive access to all data registered during your indoor and outdoor Trackman activities, allowing you to analyze your practice and play performance and track your improvements, regardless of your golf skill level.
 
Enjoy the power of the Trackman tracking technology while using Trackman range, and access detailed data reports summarizing and providing insights on all your Trackman range, simulator and practice sessions.
 
Features include:
• Live ball-data tracking for Trackman range sessions (carry, total distance, ball speed, height, launch angle and more)
• Activity overview with insightful reports for all Trackman range, indoor and practice activities
• Games that will make you stay longer on the range and compete with friends
• Your personal Trackman account with lifetime statistics including your Trackman handicap
• Updated leaderboards across competitions
• Quick login to easily connect your Trackman personal profile and immediately start tracking your golf performance
• Available in different languages (currently English, Spanish, German, French, Chinese Japanese and Korean)
 
Download Trackman Golf to unleash your potential and make practicing or playing golf a more rewarding experience, whenever you want and wherever you are.

developer: The Football Association Premier League Ltd
description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

Dive into the ultimate sports betting journey with the Unibet Sports Betting app, meticulously optimised for the UK market. 

Unibet brings the excitement of your favourite sports to your fingertips, offering a seamless blend of live betting, streaming, and unparalleled betting options. Whether you're a football fanatic, a horse racing enthusiast, or an aficionado of a diverse range of sports, Unibet caters to every passion.

Choose from a large range of sports betting markets, including:

- Global Sports: NFL, NBA, UFC, F1, MLB
- Football: Premier League, Champions League, Championship, Europa League
- Horse Racing: Cheltenham Festival, Grand National, Royal Ascot
- Rugby: Rugby Union, Rugby League, Six Nations, Super League, Rugby World Cup
- Motor Racing: F1, NASCAR, Super Car Racing
- Boxing: Domestic and World Level
- Darts: Premier League Darts, PDC World Darts Championship, World Grand Prix, Grand Slam of Darts
- Tennis: Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open
- And more: Snooker, Cricket, Golf, Greyhound Racing

Live Betting & Streaming at Its Best

Unibet TV sets you at the heart of the action, offering live streaming of major sports events, including NBA games, Modus Darts Super Series, and the Cricket Asia Cup. The thrill of live betting is just a tap away, allowing you to place bets on unfolding matches and races, ensuring you're part of the game every step of the way.

Tailored Betting Experience

Our innovative Bet Builders and Uniboost options allow you to craft personalised bets across all major sports leagues and tournaments, including the Premier League, NFL, and NBA. Moreover, with our specialised horse racing betting features, such as Uniboosts and Best Odds Guaranteed*, we ensure that racing aficionados receive the best value and experience, especially during major events like the Cheltenham Festival.

Enjoy Horse Racing Betting

Fancy a bet on Racing? Bet on all the major racing events throughout the flat & jumps seasons – with Uniboosts and weekly promotions to make betting on the races less heavy going, and with live UK & Ireland streaming plus our Best Odds Guaranteed! 
Want more than just betting markets? You’re On!

Enhanced User Experience

Unibet is not just about betting; it's about enjoying sports in a responsible, engaging, and convenient manner. Our app is designed with intuitive navigation, ensuring easy access to all features, including:

Live streaming and cash-out options.
24/7 customer service for uninterrupted support.
A commitment to safe and responsible betting, with tools and advice available.

Why Choose Unibet?

Licensed by the UK Gambling Commission, we offer a secure and regulated betting environment.
Our app is designed for users aged 18 and over, with a valid Unibet account required for play.
We provide comprehensive guides and tips to enhance your betting strategy, alongside exclusive member benefits and the latest sports updates.
Join the Unibet community today by downloading the app, and embark on a sports betting journey like no other. Remember, this is real money gambling, so please gamble responsibly and only bet what you can afford. For gambling addiction help and support, please contact BeGambleAware at: UK: https://www.begambleaware.org or call 0808 8020 133.

*Terms apply to all promotions and offers. Visit our website for more details.

Pysy yhteydessä lempikenttääsi missä tahansa liikutkin. WiseGolf tarjoaa entistä helppokäyttöisemmän ja intuitiivisemman käyttökokemuksen, jotta pelaaminen olisi vaivatonta ja nautinnollista. Lataa ilmainen sovellus, kirjaudu sisään, varaa aikasi ja lähde pelaamaan. Tervetuloa WiseGolfin pariin!

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

developer: International Ski and Snowboard Federation FIS
description: Calling all winter sports fans! The Official FIS App remains the #1 hub for Alpine Skiing, Cross‑Country, Ski Jumping, Freeski, Snowboard, Nordic Combined and more. Now you can dive deeper with Vertical Stories that highlight the best moments from our events, and a brand‑new Gaming Zone featuring an exciting fantasy game plus trivia quizzes. Tune into the latest happenings with FIS Live Radio and catch exclusive podcasts from athletes, experts and behind‑the‑scenes stories. Follow live races, view FIS TV highlights, check results and stats all in one place. Download now and immerse yourself in the world of winter sports like never before.

Mobiili laajennus Suomen suosituimmalle joukkuetyökalulle.

Nimenhuuton on helppokäyttöisyydestä palkittu ja suosittu sovellus joukkueille. Teemme joukkueen arjesta helpompaa. Näet yhdellä silmäyksellä, keitä on tulossa harjoituksiin ja peleihin. Kalenteri ja ilmoittautumiset aina ajan tasalla. Saat ilmoitukset tulevista tapahtumista ja viesteistä suoraan puhelimeesi.

Oletpa valmentaja, pelaaja tai joukkueenjohtaja, voit keskittyä lajiisi ja antaa palvelun hoitaa joukkueen manageroinnin. Huom. junnujoukkueessa pelaajien vanhemmat pysyvät automaattisesti kartalla joukkueen tapahtumista, kalenterista ja uutisista.

Huom. tämä apps ei ole mainoksilla tuettu, vaan pyytää tilausmaksua testijakson jälkeen.

Käyttäjiemme keskuudessa suosituimpia lajeja ovat:

Jalkapallo
Salibandy
Jääkiekko
Koripallo
Lentopallo
Käsipallo
Pesäpallo
Rugby
Futsal
Kaukalopallo

MATCHi - Connect with other players across the globe!

Download the app to find venues, book courts and explore memberships and activities. If your heart beats for padel, tennis, badminton, table tennis, pickleball or squash - welcome to be a part of our MATCHi community!

KEY FEATURES

- Book a court seamlessly
- Find venues and available times
- Simple overview of your favorite venues
- Filter by sport, date, time and court type
- Explore activities and memberships
- All the biggest racket sports
- Manage your bookings easily
- Invite your friends and split payments
- Multiple payment methods

HOW IT WORKS

1. Register/log into the app
2. Select the venue you want to find available courts, activities or memberships for
3. Select date, time and location
4. Choose payment method and book!

MORE ABOUT MATCHi

MATCHi exists to empower people in racket sports through user-friendly tech. With over 10 years of experience, we’ve found the perfect balance between user-friendly technology and powerful functionality. Regardless if your heart beats for padel, tennis, badminton, table tennis, pickleball or squash.

Can’t find the venue you search for? Tell your club manager about MATCHi and ask them to contact us!
Accede a toda la información necesaria para el corredor de la Zurich Maratón San Sebastián. Podrás consultar también los tiempos de los atletas y realizar un seguimiento del evento en directo.

Revamp your sports routine with Thril!

Thril is an app that brings all your sports and fitness opportunities together in one place. Whether you’re looking for single reservations, recurring reservations, playing partners, social events, sports clubs, or trying out new activities like padel, tennis, and many other sports, you’ll find them all effortlessly in one app.

With Thril, you can browse and discover sports venues through an interactive map view, making it quick and easy to find what you need. By filtering options by distance, sport type, or city, you can pinpoint the perfect fit for your preferences.

Inviting friends to join you has never been simpler. Share your booking details or invite them to split the costs directly through the app – all seamlessly handled on one platform.

Join the fun and experience how easy and enjoyable staying active can be. Download Thril today!

YHTEISÖLLINEN Luo harrastuksesi ympärille oma yhteisösi! Löydä tasoistasi peliseuraa sekä uusia tuttavuuksia pelikaverihaulla, ja ilmoittaudu mukaan mielenkiintoisimpiin tapahtumiin. Voit myös perustaa omia peliryhmiä tai liittyä avoimiin taso- tai teemaryhmiin. Applikaation kautta pääset myös lukemaan klubisi tuoreimmat uutiset ensimmäisten joukossa.

YKSILÖLLINEN 
Luo oma pelaajaprofiili, määritä tasosi ja asetuksesi, jotta myös muut käyttäjät voivat tutustua sinuun! Lisäksi profiilin kautta pystyt reaaliaikaisesti tarkastelemaan ja hyödyntämään omia ostojasi, kuten kymppikortteja tai smoothiepasseja!

KANNUSTAVA 
Älykäs bonusjärjestelmä palkitsee käyttäjän jokaisesta ostoksesta bonuspisteillä, joilla voit lunastaa saatavilla olevia kanta-asiakasetuja. 

HELPPOKÄYTTÖINEN
 Varaa pelivuorosi näppärästi ja valitse mukaan sinua kiinnostavat oheispalvelut! Lisäksi applikaation välinekauppa kokoaa yhteen verkko- ja kivijalkakauppojen parhaat puolet, joten Padel Famissa pääset nauttimaan kokonaisvaltaisesta padelkokemuksesta!​

The NHL App  dives into the 2025-26 season with a host of exciting new features, including:

– Stats, reimagined. We’ve got League Leaders, no doubt… and a whole lot more. Discover a Stats surface that incorporates EDGE Advanced Stats, Data Visualizations and even some fun facts and new ways of looking at the game. More modules rolling out as the season unfolds.

– Live Activities made its rookie (ok, beta) debut during the playoffs last season; it’s back and now fully-featured. Choose one game, or opt-in for any (or all!) teams so you can set it and forget it!

– How to Watch: There’s more ways than ever to watch a game, and we got you covered with our expanded feature – all the info to know where to stream, tune in or follow along.

– Navigation: We’ve rearranged the furniture a bit to let you jump directly to a Team or Player from our new Search bar, added tab bar-level access to Stats, and the evolution of the latest tab into your Home for all things hockey is underway.  

A refreshed and timely onboarding flow reviews your choices, setting you up to experience all the NHL App has to offer, just the way you like it: breaking news notifications, up-to-the-minute scores and live Gamecenter, new EDGE stats, Game Stories & video highlights, your favorite team’s icon and Goal Horn game alerts & much more.
